title: GS

papers.title: Tsamardinos, I., Aliferis, C. F., Statnikov, A. R., & Statnikov, E. (2003). Algorithms for large scale Markov blanket discovery

meta_description: The grow-shrink (GS) algorithm is based on the Markov blanket of the nodes in a DAG. For a specific node, the Markov blanket it the set of nodes which conditioning upon renders it conditionally independent from all other variables.
